title: GET_PED_HAIR_HIGHLIGHT_COLOR
content:
0x4B087305// GetPedHairHighlightColor
int GET_PED_HAIR_HIGHLIGHT_COLOR(Ped ped);Parameters:ped: The target pedReturns: Returns ped's secondary hair colour.A getter for _SET_PED_HAIR_COLOR. Returns -1 if fails to get.Examples:Lualocal secondaryColour = GetPedHairHighlightColor(PlayerPedId())
if secondaryColour == 32 then
  print("You have pink hair highlight colour!")
end
codeBlocks:
local secondaryColour = GetPedHairHighlightColor(PlayerPedId())
if secondaryColour == 32 then
  print("You have pink hair highlight colour!")
end
